statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT location, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_source='Solar' ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location='California' AND energy_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT plant_name, energy_source, energy_usage FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location='New York' OR location='Texas';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, energy_usage FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY energy_usage ASC, plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants;
SELECT plant_name, renewable_energy_usage FROM manufacturing_plants;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_capacity > 100;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE renewable_energy_usage > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE renewable_energy_usage > 0.5;
SELECT plant_name, location, renewable_energy_usage FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE renewable_energy_usage < 0.3 ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY source_capacity DESC;
SELECT plant_name, source_name FROM manufacturing_plants JOIN energy_sources ON manufacturing_plants.plant_id = energy_sources.source_id;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE daily_energy_usage > 100;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT plant_id, energy_capacity FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY energy_capacity DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, efficiency FROM energy_analysis WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT plant_name, location, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE daily_energy_usage > 500;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT plant_name, energy_capacity FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY energy_capacity DESC;
SELECT plant_name, energy_source, efficiency FROM manufacturing_plants INNER JOIN energy_analysis ON manufacturing_plants.plant_id = energy_analysis.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE renewable_energy_source='Solar';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, renewable_energy_source FROM Manufacturing_Plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, renewable_energy_source FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE renewable_energy_source='Wind' AND location='California';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, renewable_energy_source FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE renewable_energy_source='Hydro' AND location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE plant_name = 'ABC Plant';
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE renewable_energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT plant_name, location, renewable_energy_source FROM Manufacturing_Plants ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT plant_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM Manufacturing_Plants INNER JOIN Energy_Consumption ON Manufacturing_Plants.plant_id = Energy_Consumption.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name;

SELECT Manufacturing_Plants.plant_name, Energy_Sustainability.sustainability_rating FROM Manufacturing_Plants INNER JOIN Energy_Sustainability ON Manufacturing_Plants.plant_id = Energy_Sustainability.plant_id WHERE Energy_Sustainability.year = 2022 ORDER BY Energy_Sustainability.sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT plant_name, energy_source, location FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY plant_id DESC;

SELECT energy_usage.plant_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM energy_usage INNER JOIN manufacturing_plants ON energy_usage.plant_id = manufacturing_plants.plant_id GROUP BY energy_usage.plant_id;

SELECT plant_name, source_name, percentage FROM manufacturing_plants JOIN plant_sources ON manufacturing_plants.plant_id = plant_sources.plant_id JOIN renewable_sources ON plant_sources.source_id = renewable_sources.source_id WHERE percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_plants ORDER BY plant_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE location LIKE '%city%'
SELECT plant_name, energy_source FROM manufacturing_plants WHERE energy_source = 'Wind'
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM manufacturing_plants JOIN energy_usage ON manufacturing_plants.plant_id = energy_usage.plant_id GROUP BY plant_id

SELECT plant_name, source_name, percentage FROM manufacturing_plants JOIN plant_sources ON manufacturing_plants.plant_id = plant_sources.plant_id JOIN renewable_sources ON plant_sources.source_id = renewable_sources.source_id
